modName: Dungeon - Lair of Kas the Bloody
summary: A dungeon of vampires. Hope you enjoy it
descriptionHtml:
Thank you KENTINBOURIN for the french translation of this dungeon. I will be uploading the translation in a nmm installer as soon as i have the time.

Hey guys this is my first dungeon. after 3 days i am proud to say its ready for public. 
Quests coming as soon as i learn how to make them.

known issues are :

a few rocks block some of the lower halfe of the entrance. --- this was intended for effect.
followers wont enter.  --- I have no idea they work great inside the dungeon but i just cant seem to get them in. until i figure it out use player.placeatme to get them in.
I KEEP DYING --- LOL yeah i had this issue. If you have WIS installed it will happen. just disable wisIV - vampires and werewolves and you\'ll be fine.
author: Ryoskeith
